properties.description: The retired boxer turned real estate investor is partnering with the Nakash family and Eli Gindi to acquire a large stake in the former Versace Mansion, now known as Villa Casa Casuarina.

properties.description: Mayweather, via his Fojoso LLC, sold the 10,853-square-foot house at 288 South Coconut Lane to a company managed by Morris Betesh
